means: 有政治家风格的，有政治家之身份的

sentence.Network_en: He was widely respected as a wise and statesmanlike governor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他作为一位睿智、具备政治家才干的州长而广受尊崇。

sentence.Network_en: He was commended for his statesmanlike handling of the crisis.
sentence.Network_cn: 他处理那场危机，因表现出政治家的才干而受到称赞。

sentence.Network_en: He is trying to project a more dignified, statesmanlike image in this election year.
sentence.Network_cn: 他正试图在这个选举年中树立一种更加威严、更有政治家风范的形象。

PerfectNetExp.abs: statesman 政治家statesmanlike 有政治家风格的statesmanly 像政治家的
up and down the country-Why not throughout the nation ? used when a politician needs to appear statesmanlike and non-partisan .举国上下----为什么不干脆说全国呢？政治家想要显得特别重要、别有风度的时候酷爱此词。

PerfectNetExp.exp: 有政治家才干和风度的
PerfectNetExp.abs: ... statesman n. 政治家；国务活动家 statesmanlike adj. 有政治家才干和风度的 unconditional adj. 无条件的；无限制的；绝对的.
so it was clear enough who had acted in a statesmanlike way , and who was playing small-time politics .因此，这就很清楚谁更以政治家风度的方式行事，以及谁在玩弄二流的政治手腕。

list.abs: so it was clear enough who had acted in a statesmanlike way , and who was playing small-time politics .因此，这就很清楚谁更以政治家风度的方式行事，以及谁在玩弄二流的政治手腕。

entry.tran: 有政治家风范的;有政治家才干的
entry.def: If you describe someone, especially a political leader, as statesmanlike, you approve of them because they give the impression of being very able and experienced.

example.ex: He was widely respected as a wise and statesmanlike governor...
example.tran: 他作为一位睿智、具备政治家才干的州长而广受尊崇。

example.ex: He is trying to project a more dignified, statesmanlike image in this election year.
example.tran: 他正试图在这个选举年中树立一种更加威严、更有政治家风范的形象。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by the qualities of or befitting a statesman;

sentences.sentence: "a statesmanlike solution of the present perplexities"-V.L.Parrington

auth_sentence.content: A statesmanlike speech in very elegant French.
auth_sentence.res_content: A statesmanlike speech in very elegant French.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A statesmanlike speech in very elegant French.

auth_sentence.content: He looked reasonable, and vaguely statesmanlike.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He looked reasonable, and vaguely statesmanlike.

auth_sentence.content: The defense secretary says India has acted in what he calls a "very statesmanlike manner" since then.
auth_sentence.res_content: The defense secretary says India has acted in what he calls a "very statesmanlike manner" since then.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The defense secretary says India has acted in what he calls a "very statesmanlike manner" since then.
